data.Name: Code Orange
data.Description: Doors 6PM Show 7PM All support acts and times subject to change In the best interest of fans and staff, the Event Organizer is monitoring local COVID-19 trends and will meet or exceed protocols mandated by local governments. By purchasing tickets to this event, you agree to abide by the health and safety measures in effect at the time of the event, which may include, but not be limited to, wearing masks, providing proof of vaccination status and/or providing proof of negative COVID-19 test. Check back often for updates to your event venue website as guidelines are subject to change.

data.Name: Code Orange
data.Bio: Code Orange (formerly Code Orange Kids) is an American metalcore band that formed in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, United States in 2008. The band consists of guitarist, keyboardist and backing vocalist Eric "Shade" Balderose, guitarist and vocalist Reba Meyers, vocalist and drummer Jami Morgan, bassist Joe Goldman, guitarist Dominic Landolina and session drummer Ethan Young. The band signed to Deathwish Inc. for their first two studio albums: Love Is Love/Return to Dust released in 2012 and I Am King in 2014. Read more on Last.fm
